info.name: Vaidhya API
info.description: Complete API collection for Vaidhya backend

request.description: Register a new user with mobile number and user type

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Dr. John Doe",
    "email": "john.doe@example.com",
    "specialty": "Cardiology",
    "qualifications": "MBBS, MD",
    "experience": 10,
    "bio": "Experienced cardiologist with 10 years of practice"
}

{
    "recordId": "record_id_here",
    "title": "Updated Blood Test",
    "date": "2023-01-15",
    "doctorName": "Dr. Smith",
    "hospitalName": "City Hospital",
    "description": "Routine blood test with additional tests",
    "documentUrl": "https://example.com/document.pdf"
}

{
    "name": "City Hospital",
    "email": "info@cityhospital.com",
    "phone": "+919876543210",
    "address": "123 Main St",
    "city": "Mumbai",
    "state": "Maharashtra",
    "postalCode": "400001",
    "website": "https://cityhospital.com",
    "description": "Leading hospital in the city"
}
